title: Carles Puyol
summary: Carles Puyol Saforcada (Catalan pronunciation: [ˈkaɾles puˈjɔl safoɾˈkaða]; born 13 April 1978) is a Spanish former professional footballer who played his entire career for Barcelona. He mainly played as a central defender, but he could also play in either full-back position, mostly as a right-back.[4] Praised for his defensive qualities and leadership, he is widely regarded as one of the best defenders and captains in the history of the sport.[5][6]
